description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=2/3. The wall is all that stands between the last of the human race and the zombie onslaught. Defend the wall with your turret and buy defenses to keep them from breaking it down.  They will never stop and they will grow in number. How long can you last?
description.short: The wall is all that stands between the last of the human race and the zombie onslaught. Defend the wall with your turret and buy defenses to keep them from breaking it down.  They will never stop and they will grow in number. How long can you last?
